case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: Mummified remains discovered by hunters in remote mountainous region. The decedent may have been back-packing through the area.  A  small blue note pad with the name "Louie T Valdivio" written on it was found nearby.  Also written on the sheets of this note pad were song lyrics or a poem.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available

Brown belt with two parallel rows of eyelets, a knife sheath or case over the left front part of the belt
Blue stocking cap

White socks with blue trim
Blue socks
Brown boots, "Sears" brand, size unknown (described as hiking boots)
case_other_items_with_body: Carved pipe (wooden pipe); blue nylon wallet; Compass in a purple cloth case; Swiss army knife, red, found in sheath on belt; note pad with the name "Louie T Valdivio" and a poem or lyric.
